title: ICE: ProjectionKinds Deref and Field were mismatched: (Deref, Field(5, 0))

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I'm going to try to make a minimal rust example, in the mean time, this commit has my code in the state that causes the ICE: https://github.com/mendess/wtime/tree/246e60ceb9b65f4e389eaf6c4b76a05995894a92 The error message points to [`main.rs`](https://github.com/mendess/wtime/blob/246e60ceb9b65f4e389eaf6c4b76a05995894a92/src/main.rs#L134) ### Meta #### Stable `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 59eed8a2aac0230a8b53e89d4e99d55912ba6b35 commit-date: 2021-11-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.56.1 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` #### Nightly The ICE does not happen in any of these nightly versions: ``` rustc 1.58.0-nightly (46b8e7488 2021-11-07) binary: rustc commit-hash: 46b8e7488eae116722196e8390c1bd2ea2e396cf commit-date: 2021-11-07 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ``` rustc 1.58.0-nightly (6d246f0c8 2021-11-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: 6d246f0c8d3063fea86abbb65a824362709541ba commit-date: 2021-11-26 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` #### Beta This seems to also not be present in beta ``` rustc 1.57.0-beta.7 (ef1a3b934 2021-11-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: ef1a3b93491be53289ab6b8af235a9e100d771f2 commit-date: 2021-11-19 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.57.0-beta.7 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ```rust error[E0616]: field `selected` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:254:41 | 254 | .style(if action == new.selected { | ^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `action` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:267:48 | 267 | let action = mkparagraph("action", new.action.as_str(), Selected::Action); | ^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `start_time` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:268:57 | 268 | let start_time = mkparagraph("start time", &new.start_time, Selected::StartTime); | ^^^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `end_time` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:269:53 | 269 | let end_time = mkparagraph("end time", &new.end_time, Selected::EndTime); | ^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `day` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:270:43 | 270 | let day = mkparagraph("day", &new.day, Selected::Day); | ^^^ private field error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_typeck/src/check/upvar.rs:641:30: ProjectionKinds Deref and Field were mismatched: (Deref, Field(5, 0)) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1147:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [typeck] type-checking `ui` #1 [typeck] type-checking `ui::{closure#0}::{closure#0}` end of query stack For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0616`. error: could not compile `wtime` due to 5 previous errors ``` #### The above mentioned nightly error output ```rust error[E0616]: field `selected` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:254:41 | 254 | .style(if action == new.selected { | ^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `action` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:267:48 | 267 | let action = mkparagraph("action", new.action.as_str(), Selected::Action); | ^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `start_time` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:268:57 | 268 | let start_time = mkparagraph("start time", &new.start_time, Selected::StartTime); | ^^^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `end_time` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:269:53 | 269 | let end_time = mkparagraph("end time", &new.end_time, Selected::EndTime); | ^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `day` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:270:43 | 270 | let day = mkparagraph("day", &new.day, Selected::Day); | ^^^ private field error[E0283]: type annotations needed for `{integer}` --> src/main.rs:291:72 | 159 | let mut total_days = 0; | -------------- consider giving `total_days` a type ... 291 | let avg_per_day = Paragraph::new(fmt_duration(total_month_time / total_days)).block( | ^ cannot infer type for type `{integer}` | = note: multiple `impl`s satisfying `time::Duration: Div<{integer}>` found in the `time` crate: - impl Div for time::Duration; - impl Div for time::Duration; - impl Div for time::Duration; - impl Div for time::Duration; and 2 more Some errors have detailed explanations: E0283, E0616. For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0283`. error: could not compile `wtime` due to 6 previous errors ``` #### The above mentioned beta output ```rust error[E0616]: field `selected` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:254:41 | 254 | .style(if action == new.selected { | ^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `action` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:267:48 | 267 | let action = mkparagraph("action", new.action.as_str(), Selected::Action); | ^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `start_time` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:268:57 | 268 | let start_time = mkparagraph("start time", &new.start_time, Selected::StartTime); | ^^^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `end_time` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:269:53 | 269 | let end_time = mkparagraph("end time", &new.end_time, Selected::EndTime); | ^^^^^^^^ private field error[E0616]: field `day` of struct `ActivityBeingBuilt` is private --> src/main.rs:270:43 | 270 | let day = mkparagraph("day", &new.day, Selected::Day); | ^^^ private field For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0616`. error: could not compile `wtime` due to 5 previous errors ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1147:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: alloc::slice::::sort_by::{{closure}} 8: alloc::slice::merge_sort 9: rustc_typeck::check::upvar::::compute_min_captures 10: rustc_typeck::check::upvar::::analyze_closure 11: ::visit_expr 12: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_stmt 13: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 14: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_expr 15: ::visit_expr 16: ::visit_expr 17: rustc_typeck::check::upvar::::closure_analyze 18: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 19: rustc_typeck::check::typeck 20: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 21: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 22: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 23: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 24: ::typeck 25: rustc_typeck::check::typeck 26: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 27: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 28: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 29: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 30: ::typeck 31: rustc_middle::ty::::par_body_owners 32: rustc_typeck::check::typeck_item_bodies 33: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 34: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 35: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 36: ::typeck_item_bodies 37: rustc_session::utils::::time 38: rustc_typeck::check_crate 39: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 40: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 41: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 42: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 43: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 44: ::analysis 45: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 46: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 47: rustc_span::with_source_map 48: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.56.1 (59eed8a2a 2021-11-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [typeck] type-checking `ui` #1 [typeck] type-checking `ui::{closure#0}::{closure#0}` #2 [typeck_item_bodies] type-checking all item bodies #3 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack ```
